meanings.definition: A telephone service providing help or advice to people in distress.
meanings.sent1: I called the helpline when I needed help with my homework.
meanings.sent2: The helpline is available 24/7 for anyone who needs assistance.
meanings.sent3: The helpline operator had a soothing voice that made me feel better instantly.
meanings.sent4: The helpline was a lifeline for many during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: Remember to keep the helpline number handy in case of emergencies.

meanings.definition: A support line offering assistance to those in need.
meanings.sent1: She dialed the helpline to talk to someone about her problems.
meanings.sent2: The helpline volunteers are trained to provide emotional support.
meanings.sent3: The helpline became her go-to place whenever she felt overwhelmed.
meanings.sent4: To her, the helpline was like a safety net in times of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The helpline's caring staff made a difference in many lives.
